Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Red Onion and wash
Scallions and wash
Garlic Cloves
Bell Pepper and wash
Zuchinnis and wash
Crimini Mushrooms and wash
Soy Sauce
Pad Thai Sauces
Spirilizer
Vegetable Oil

Vegan Recipe

Put 3 seconds of Vegetable Oil in pantelligent on 4
Cut Red Onion
Cut Scallions
Cut Bell Pepper
Cut Garlic Cloves
Cut Crimini Mushrooms
Wait 7 minutes put vegetables in pan
Spirilizer Zuchinnis
Wait 7 minutes
Put sprilized zuchinni in the pan
Wait 2 minutes
Put in 1 tsp Soy Sauce
Put in 2 tbsps Pad Thai Sauces
